thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Elite Varainhoito H2 Operating Profit Before Depreciation Falls To EUR 0.4 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Elite Varainhoito H2 Operating Profit Before Depreciation Falls To EUR 0.4 Mln
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Elite Varainhoito Oyj:
* ‍JULY-DEC COMPARABLE NET SALES GREW BY 31% TO EUR 8.0 MILLION​
* ‍JULY-DEC OPERATING PROFIT BEFORE DEPRECIATION DECREASED 27% TO EUR 0.4 MILLION​
* JULY-DEC ‍PROFIT FOR PERIOD INCREASED BY 369%, TOTALLING EUR 1.2 MILLION​
* ‍REITERATES PREVIOUS ESTIMATE THAT OPERATING PROFIT BEFORE DEPRECIATION WILL INCREASE TO EUR 5-6 MILLION IN 2018​
* ‍OBJECTIVE IS TO FURTHER INCREASE AMOUNT OF ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
